instructions:
───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
CONFIGURATION GUIDE FOR RESEARCH FUNDING COST-BENEFIT CALCULATOR
───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

This file defines how the calculator behaves — including overhead rates,
available grant schemes (funders), and University/Faculty co-funding rules.
The calculator automatically reads this file when loaded from the same folder
as index.html on your GitHub Pages site.

───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
1)  OVERHEAD POLICY
───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Use the 'overhead' section to set the department's standard indirect-cost
(OH) rates.  Example:

  "overhead": {
    "label": "ITIT 2025",
    "salary_percent": 62,
    "other_percent": 52
  }

• label – short text shown in the badge (e.g. “ITIT 2025”)
• salary_percent – overhead percentage on salary costs
• other_percent – overhead percentage on other costs

───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
2)  DEFAULT SCHEME
───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
  "defaultScheme": "vr"

Sets which grant scheme appears selected by default when the page loads.
The value must match one of the “id” fields under “schemes”.

───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
3)  ADDING OR EDITING FUNDERS / GRANT SCHEMES
───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Each scheme is one object inside the “schemes” array, for example:

  {
    "id": "unique_id",
    "name": "Grant Scheme Name",
    "funder": { … },
    "uf_rules": [ … ]
  }

───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
3A)  FUNDER OBJECT
───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
The "funder" object defines how the funding body covers indirect costs.

Choose ONE of the following modes:

1.  "percent_overhead"   – funder covers a % of the department overhead
      Example: { "mode": "percent_overhead", "value": 100,
                 "label": "Covers 100% of overhead" }

2.  "percent_total"      – funder gives indirects as a % of total grant
      Example: { "mode": "percent_total", "value": 25,
                 "label": "Covers up to 25% indirect (cascading)" }

3.  "absolute"           – funder covers a fixed SEK amount of overhead
      Example: { "mode": "absolute", "value": 150000,
                 "label": "Fixed 150 000 SEK overhead" }

4.  "none"               – no specified coverage of indirect costs
      Example: { "mode": "none", "value": 0,
                 "label": "No specified indirect coverage" }

5.  "manual"             – reserved for the 'Other' scheme; lets the user
                             enter overhead coverage manually in the UI
      Example: { "mode": "manual", "value": null,
                 "label": "Manual entry" }

───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
3B)  UNIVERSITY / FACULTY (UF) CONTRIBUTION RULES
───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Each funder may have one or more university/faculty co-funding rules
listed under “uf_rules”.

If the funder has no such contribution, set:

  "uf_rules": []

and the calculator will hide that line completely.

Each rule must have:
• name – who contributes (e.g. “Vice Chancellor”, “Faculty”)
• mode – how the contribution is calculated
• notes – short descriptive text shown to the user

Available modes:

1.  "percent_total"   → % of the total project amount
      { "name": "Vice Chancellor", "mode": "percent_total",
        "value": 25, "notes": "VC 25% of total" }

2.  "percent_total_capped_per_year"   → % of total, but capped per year
      { "name": "Faculty", "mode": "percent_total_capped_per_year",
        "value": 5, "per_year_cap": 1000000,
        "notes": "Faculty 5% (max 1M/yr)" }

3.  "fixed_per_year"   → fixed SEK amount each project year
      { "name": "Vice Chancellor", "mode": "fixed_per_year",
        "amount_per_year": 750000, "notes": "VC 750k/yr" }

───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
3C)  ORDER AND THE SPECIAL 'OTHER' SCHEME
───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
• All normal schemes appear in the dropdown in the order listed here.
• The special “other” scheme is automatically placed last and allows users
  to type custom funder coverage values.
  Example:
    {
      "id": "other",
      "name": "Other",
      "funder": { "mode": "manual", "value": null,
                   "label": "Manual entry" },
      "uf_rules": []
    }

───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
4)  VALIDATION AND BEST PRACTICES
───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
• Every “id” must be unique.
• “defaultScheme” must match one of those ids.
• Numeric values (percentages or SEK) must not include % signs or commas.
• If there is no Uni/Faculty contribution, set “uf_rules”: [].
• “label” and “notes” are free text for display only.

───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
5)  QUICK EXAMPLES
───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

Example 1 – Funder covers all overhead, no Uni/Faculty:
  {
    "id": "vr",
    "name": "VR – Swedish Research Council",
    "funder": { "mode": "percent_overhead", "value": 100,
                 "label": "Covers 100% of overhead" },
    "uf_rules": []
  }

Example 2 – Funder covers 20% overhead + VC and Faculty contributions:
  {
    "id": "kaw_project",
    "name": "KAW – Projects",
    "funder": { "mode": "percent_overhead", "value": 20,
                 "label": "Covers 20% of overhead" },
    "uf_rules": [
      { "name": "Vice Chancellor", "mode": "percent_total",
         "value": 25, "notes": "VC 25% of total" },
      { "name": "Faculty", "mode": "percent_total_capped_per_year",
         "value": 5, "per_year_cap": 1000000,
         "notes": "Faculty 5% (max 1M/yr)" }
    ]
  }

Example 3 – ERC-style 25% cascading coverage + fixed per-year contributions:
  {
    "id": "erc_stg",
    "name": "ERC – Starting Grant",
    "funder": { "mode": "percent_total", "value": 25,
                 "label": "Covers up to 25% indirect (cascading on total)" },
    "uf_rules": [
      { "name": "Vice Chancellor", "mode": "fixed_per_year",
         "amount_per_year": 750000, "notes": "VC 750k/yr" },
      { "name": "Faculty", "mode": "fixed_per_year",
         "amount_per_year": 250000, "notes": "Faculty 250k/yr" }
    ]
  }

───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
END OF INSTRUCTIONS
───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
